name: Sterile Water
indications: Sterile Water for Irrigation is indicated for use as an irrigant.
contraindications: • For Irrigation only. Not for injection or infusion by usual parenteral routes. ( 2.1 , 5.1 ) • The volume and/or rate of irrigation depend on the type of the procedure and the capacity or the surface area of the structure to be irrigated. ( 2.2 ) • For preparation and administration instructions see the full prescribing information. ( 2.1 , 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions:
Sterile Water for Irrigation is supplied in single-dose plastic pour bottles and flexible plastic containers as follows:

                     Storage
                  
                  Exposure of pharmaceutical products to heat should be minimized. Avoid excessive heat. 
                  Store at room temperature (25°C): brief exposure up to 40°C does not adversely affect the product.
